pullRequest.title: Remove hard coded sorting for compatible feature dependency
pullRequest.bodyText:
Process the resolver report conflict chains to find the first
feature in the conflict chain that has a direct dependency
on a compatible feature that is in conflict.
This ensures the best error message can be displayed
for the configured features that cause the conflict

nodes.bodyText:
Change
"Unable to load conflicting versions of features \"" + conflictRecord2.conflict + ...
to
"Unable to load conflicting versions of features \"" + conflictRecord1.conflict + ...
You can move the getTolerates() to line 1840.
Unrelated to this review: Removing features from the resolved set is unnecessary when disableAllOnConflict is true.

beforeCommit.message:
Remove hard coded sorting for compatible feature dependency

Process the resolver report conflict chains to find the first
feature in the conflict chain that has a direct dependency
on a compatible feature that is in conflict.

This ensures the best error message can be displayed
for the configured features that cause the conflict

nodes.bodyText: Can we remove _EE from the message property names?  Eventually we'll have to generalize the message property names and also the comments heading these each messages, e.g. {0} = EeProgModel1.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -212,9 +212,9 @@ UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_SAME_PLATFORM_ERROR=CWWKF0043E: The con
 UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_SAME_PLATFORM_ERROR.explanation=The server configuration contains an incompatible combination of features for the indicated programming models.  This conflict can happen if the two incompatible features are configured directly in the server configuration, or if the configured features include different versions of a feature that are incompatible.
 UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_SAME_PLATFORM_ERROR.useraction=Try to specify a compatible version of the configured features that caused the conflict in the server.xml file.  If no other versions are available, then the configured features are not compatible with each other and cannot be configured at the same time.
 
-# CWWK0044E  {0} = EeProgModel1: {1} = EeProgModel2: {2} = EeConflictFeature1: {3} = EeConflictFeature2: {4} = configuredFeature1: {5} configuredFeature2
-UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_DIFFERENT_PLATFORM_ERROR=CWWKF0044E: The features {2} and {3} cannot be loaded at the same time.  The feature {2} of {0} is incompatible with the feature {3} of {1}.  The configured features {4} and {5} include an incompatible combination of features.  Your configuration is not supported.  Update the configuration to use features that support either the Jakarta EE or Java EE programming models, but not both.
-UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_DIFFERENT_PLATFORM_ERROR.explanation=The server configuration contains an incompatible combination of both Jakarta EE and Java EE features.  Features that support the Jakarta EE 9 programming model are incompatible with features that support the Java EE programming models, including Jakarta EE 8.  This conflict can happen if the two incompatible features are configured directly in the server configuration, or if the configured features include different versions of a feature that are incompatible.
+# CWWK0044E  {0} = EeProgModel1: {1} = EeProgModel2: {2} = EeConflictFeature1: {3} = EeConflictFeature2: {4} = configuredFeature1: {5} configuredFeature2: {6} platformName1: {7} platformName2
+UPDATE_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_EE_FEATURES_DIFFERENT_PLATFORM_ERROR=CWWKF0044E: The features {2} and {3} cannot be loaded at the same time.  The feature {2} of {0} is incompatible with the feature {3} of {1}.  The configured features {4} and {5} include an incompatible combination of features.  Your configuration is not supported.  Update the configuration to use features that support either the {6} or {7} programming models, but not both.

nodes.bodyText:
Change "The features {2} and {3}" to "The {2} and {3} features".
Change "The feature {2} of {0}" to "The {2} of {0} feature".
Change "with the feature {3} of {1}" to "with the {3} of {1} feature."
Change "The configured features {4} and {5}" to "The {4} and {5} configured features".

nodes.bodyText:
Remove extra space after "combination of features".
Remove extra space after "including Jakarta EE 8".

Features that support the Jakarta EE 9 programming model are incompatible with features that support the Java EE programming models, including Jakarta EE 8. +# CWWK0044E  {0} = EeProgModel1: {1} = EeProgModel2: {2} = EeConflictFeature1: {3} = EeConflictFeature2: {4} = configuredFeature1: {5} configuredFeature2: {6} platformName1: {7} platformName2

Features that support the Jakarta EE 9 programming model are incompatible with features that support the Java EE programming models, including Jakarta EE 8.  This conflict can happen if the two incompatible features are configured directly in the server configuration, or if the configured features include different versions of a feature that are incompatible.

nodes.bodyText:
Change "The features {2} and {3}" to "The  {2} and {3} features".
Change " The feature {2} of {0}" to "The {2} of {0} feature".
Change "with the feature {3} of {1}" to "with the  {3} of {1} featue".
Change "The configured features {4} and {5}" to "The {4} and {5} configured features".
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -226,6 +226,11 @@ UPDATE_DISABLED_FEATURES_ON_CONFLICT=CWWKF0046W: The configuration includes an i
 UPDATE_DISABLED_FEATURES_ON_CONFLICT.explanation=The configuration includes an incompatible combination of features. To avoid invalid behavior, the feature manager disabled all features.
 UPDATE_DISABLED_FEATURES_ON_CONFLICT.useraction=Specify a different version of the configured features that caused the conflict.
 
+# CWWK0044E  {0} = EeProgModel1: {1} = EeProgModel2: {2} = EeConflictFeature1: {3} = EeConflictFeature2: {4} = configuredFeature1: {5} configuredFeature2 {6} EePlaformCommonToProgModels
+UPDATE_INDIRECT_CONFLICT_INCOMPATIBLE_FEATURES_SAME_PLATFORM_ERROR=CWWKF0047E: The features {2} and {3} cannot be loaded at the same time.  The feature {2} of {0} is incompatible with the feature {3} of {1}. The configuration includes an incompatible combination of {6} features that is not supported.  The configured features {4} and {5} include an incompatible combination of features.  Your configuration is not supported.  Update the configuration to use compatible versions of the configured features that support the {0} or {1} programming models.

nodes.bodyText: Remove the extra space after "indicated programming models".

If no other versions are available, then the configured features are not compatible with each other and cannot be configured at the same time.
